SuperstitioMod:ExposeSelfPower.NAME: Self-Exposure
DESCRIPTIONS: Lasts for %d turn(s). When you take attack damage, gain #ySmeared Semen equal to half the damage taken.

SuperstitioMod:InsideSemen.NAME: Internal Semen
DESCRIPTIONS: Current amount: #b%d. NL Current value: #b%d. NL Used as a card resource.

SuperstitioMod:OutsideSemen.NAME: Smeared Semen
DESCRIPTIONS: Current amount: #b%d. NL Current value: #b%d. NL Used as a card resource.

SuperstitioMod:FloorSemen.NAME: Spilled Semen
DESCRIPTIONS: Current amount: #b%d. NL Current value: #b%d. NL Used as a card resource.

SuperstitioMod:DelayHpLosePower_ApplyOnl.NAME: #rCorruption
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat: NL #rLose #r%d #rHP.

SuperstitioMod:DelayHpLosePower_ApplyOnA.NAME: #rCorruption
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon next time you take attack damage or at the end of combat: NL #rLose #r%d #rHP.

SuperstitioMod:SexPlateArmorPower.NAME: Layered Armor
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, gain #b%d #yBlock. When you lose HP from attack damage, reduce stacks by #b1.

SuperstitioMod:PreventHpLimit_Times.NAME: Passion
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, the next #b%d times you take attack damage and lose HP, you do *not* #rEmbrace Corruption.

SuperstitioMod:PreventHpLimit_Turns.NAME: Passion
DESCRIPTIONS: For #b%d turn(s), when you take attack damage and lose HP, you do *not* #rEmbrace Corruption.

MAKE_KEYWORDS.DESCRIPTION: When taking attack damage and losing HP, you do *not* #rEmbrace Corruption.
